code_of_laws.name: Code of Laws
code_of_laws.unlocks: Survey, Discipline, Urban Planning, God King

military_tradition.name: Military Tradition
military_tradition.description: Grants flanking and support combat bonuses to all units.

early_empire.name: Early Empire
early_empire.eureka: Grow your civilization to at least 6 population.
early_empire.description: Unlocks the ability to enforce borders and grant Open Borders.

games_and_recreation.name: Games and Recreation
games_and_recreation.unlocks: Colosseum, Arena, Entertainment complex, Insulae policy

political_philosophy.name: Political Philosophy
political_philosophy.unlocks: Autocracy, Classical Republic, Oligarchy, Charismatic Leader, Diplomatic League

drama_and_poetry.name: Drama and Poetry
drama_and_poetry.unlocks: Amphitheater, Theater Square, Literary Tradition policy

defensive_tactics.name: Defensive Tactics
defensive_tactics.eureka: Be the target of a Declaration of War.

theology.name: Theology
theology.description: Awards 1 Envoy, obsoletes God King policy

naval_tradition.name: Naval Tradition
naval_tradition.eureka: Kill a unit with a Quadrireme

feudalism.name: Feudalism
feudalism.description: +1 Food for each farm when 3 are adjacent. Obsoletes Agoge, Ilkum

civil_service.name: Civil Service
civil_service.unlocks: Retainers policy, Meritocracy policy, Alliance agreement

mercenaries.name: Mercenaries
mercenaries.eureka: Have 8 land combat units in your army.

guilds.name: Guilds
guilds.unlocks: Chichen Itza, Craftsmen, Town Charters, Traveling Merchants

divine_right.name: Divine Right
divine_right.unlocks: Mont St. Michael, Monarchy, Chivalry, Gothic Architecture

exploration.name: Exploration
exploration.unlocks: Merchant Republic, Native Conquest, Colonial Offices, Mission
exploration.description: +1 Food from Pastures. Obsoletes Discipline, Survey, Urban Planning

humanism.name: Humanism
humanism.unlocks: Archaeological Museum, Art Museum, Frescoes, Invention

diplomatic_service.name: Diplomatic Service
diplomatic_service.unlocks: Machiavellianism, Spy unit, Resident Embassies agreement, Declare Holy War, Declare Liberation War, Declare Reconquest War, Declare Protectorate War
diplomatic_service.eureka: Have an alliance with another civilization
diplomatic_service.description: Allows Resident Embassies and your first Spy. Casus Belli may now be used to justify wars.

reformed_church.name: Reformed Church
reformed_church.unlocks: Theocracy, Religious Orders, Simultaneum, Wars of Religion

the_enlightenment.name: The Enlightenment
the_enlightenment.description: Religious Tourism effects are halved versus your civilization.

civil_engineering.name: Civil Engineering
civil_engineering.description: Can build Farms on Hills. All cities gain +200 Fortification strength and bombardment ability. Obsoletes Bastions, Corvee, Gothic Architecture, Limes, Serfdom

nationalism.name: Nationalism
nationalism.unlocks: Grande Armee, National Identity, Declare Colonial War
nationalism.eureka: Declare war using a casus belli.
nationalism.description: +1 Spy slot. Unlocks Corps and Fleets. Obsoletes Feudal Contract

opera_and_ballet.name: Opera and Ballet
opera_and_ballet.unlocks: Bolshoi Theatre wonder, Grand Opera, Symphonies

natural_history.name: Natural History
natural_history.unlocks: Archaeologist, Zoo, Hermitage, reveal Antiquity Sites

urbanization.name: Urbanization
urbanization.unlocks: Neighborhood district, Military Research, Public Transport

scorched_earth.name: Scorched Earth
scorched_earth.description: Awards 1 Envoy. Obsoletes Colonization, Land Surveyors, Raid, Sack, Strategos

conservation.name: Conservation
conservation.unlocks: Naturalist unit, Resource Management policy, National Parks
conservation.eureka: Have a Neighborhood district with Breathtaking Appeal.
conservation.description: Awards 1 Envoy. Builders may plant Woods. Old growth Woods gain +1 Appeal.

mobilization.name: Mobilization
mobilization.unlocks: Levee en Masse policy, Defensive Pact agreement, Declare War of Territorial Expansion
mobilization.description: Unlocks Army and Armada. Obsoletes Conscription

suffrage.name: Suffrage
suffrage.unlocks: Democracy, Arsenal of Democracy, Economic Union, New Deal, Their Finest Hour
suffrage.description: Obsoletes Liberalism, Medina Quarter, Naval Infrastructure, Town Charters

totalitarianism.name: Totalitarianism
totalitarianism.unlocks: Fascism, Gunboat Diplomacy, Lightning Warfare, Martial Law, Third Alternative

class_struggle.name: Class Struggle
class_struggle.unlocks: Communism, Collectivization, Defense of the Motherland, Five-Year Plan, Patriotic War

cultural_heritage.name: Cultural Heritage
cultural_heritage.unlocks: Sydney Opera House, Heritage Tourism, reveal Shipwreck resource

cold_war.name: Cold War
cold_war.description: +1 Spy slot. Obsoletes Maritime Industries, Press Gangs

rapid_deployment.name: Rapid Deployment
rapid_deployment.eureka: Build an Aerodrome or Airstrip on a foreign continent.
rapid_deployment.description: Allows airlift between Airports. Obsoletes Grand Armee.

globalization.name: Globalization
globalization.unlocks: Ecommerce, International Space Agency, Strategic Air Force
globalization.description: +1 Gold to Plantations. Obsoletes Their Finest Hour, Triangular Trade. Repeatable for additional Score.
